name: ag-grid-community
description: Advanced Data Grid / Data Table supporting Javascript / React / AngularJS / Web Components

scripts.initMarketing: git checkout marketing && npm run updateCoreDependencies && npm run buildCore
scripts.init: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuild
scripts.initFullBuild: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuild
scripts.build: npx lerna run build --ignore ag-grid-polymer-example --ignore ag-grid-charts-example
scripts.package: npx lerna run package --ignore ag-grid-polymer-example --ignore ag-grid-charts-example
scripts.cleanCoreDependencies: npx lerna clean --yes --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-docs
scripts.bootstrapCoreDependencies: npx lerna bootstrap --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-docs
scripts.buildCoreDependencies: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-angular --scope ag-grid-react --scope ag-grid-vue --scope ag-grid-docs
scripts.buildFrameworkExamples: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-angular-cli-example --scope ag-grid-react-example --scope ag-grid-vue-example
scripts.buildLegacy: npx lerna run build --scope ag-grid-community --scope ag-grid-enterprise
scripts.updateAndRebuild: npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.cleanAndRebuild: npm run clean && npm run updateAndRebuild
